release.action: Added preliminary implementation of the IP address and host name filter.
Using only a UDP port pair for all RTP/RTCP packet handling and sending for all the connected clients.
Properly clear session data when a session is closed.
Handling proper shutdown of the service.
Completely rewritten the proxy from scratch in Java
In this release there are many important bug fixes that make the proxy works with major RTSP streaming servers and video players.
The proxy was ported to MacOsX and now it can be compiled using a various Gcc versions (2.95, 3.1, 3.3, 3.4).
